text:
If you are above 60 years or between 45-59 years with comorbidities, it is now your turn to get the vaccine. 

It is time to act responsibly and get vaccinated at your turn.

#covid #covid19 #vaccine #vaccination #vaccinedrive #safetyfirst #staysafe #beresponsible #covidvaccine21 https://t.co/kfkegFSgWS
